Body:
path = Path(os.path.realpath(__file__), '../../../fixtures/VTK-VTP')
fname = Path(path.resolve(), 'test_save_vtk_2.vtp')
project = op.io.VTK.load(filename=fname)
assert len(project) == 2
net = project.network
assert net.Np == 8
assert net.Nt == 12
assert np.shape(net['pore.coords']) == (8, 3)
assert np.shape(net['throat.conns']) == (12, 2)
assert len(project.phases()) == 1
